10.m: But that you may know that the Son of Man has authority on earth to forgive sins... - Matthew 9:6a (ESV)

l.q: What did Jesus say when he saw the paralytic?
l.a: Jesus told the paralytic to take heart, his sins are forgiven.
The scribes were thinking that what Jesus said is blasphemy. Only God is able to forgive sins.

l.q: Why did Jesus first forgive the man's sins before he physically healed him?
l.a: Jesus first forgave the sins of the man so that the people would know that He has the authority on earth to forgive sins.

10.p: Jesus, while we have the tendency to focus on the temporary relief that your physical healing can give, what has eternal consequences is the forgiveness of our sins. And yet even those who are knowledgeable with God's word at that time failed to see this. You are God's greatest gift man can ever have. Thank you for working in my heart to be able to respond to your love. I pray that the rest of my loved ones will also receive you in their hearts.
